obj.ctx.all <- readRDS("E:/STOmics/seurat/Opossum/opossum_stereoseq_ctx_COLS_nofilt.rds")
obj.ctx.all$subclass_nn <- NA
# Round 1

obj.ctx.all$subclass_nn[cell_ids] <- assigned_subclasses
